text.value: You don't have permission to edit this report
Refer the child for **vaccin not up to date**
Enter the name of the reference health facility
The next visit of vaccination is for 7 days
Contactez votre administrateur s'il s'agit d'une erreur!
Vous n'avez pas le droit de modifier ce rapport. Veuillez fermer donc le formulaire!
Pourquoi le BCG n'est pas attribué ?
Pourquoi le VPO 0 n'est pas attribué ?
Pourquoi le Penta 1 n'est pas attribué ?
Pourquoi le VPO 1 n'est pas attribué ?
Pourquoi le Penta 2 n'est pas attribué ?
Pourquoi le VPO 2 n'est pas attribué ?
Pourquoi le Penta 3 n'est pas attribué ?
Pourquoi le VPO 3 n'est pas attribué ?
Pourquoi le VPI 1 n'est pas attribué ?
Pourquoi le VAR 1 n'est pas attribué ?
Pourquoi le VAA n'est pas attribué ?
Pourquoi le VPI 2 n'est pas attribué ?
Pourquoi le MenA n'est pas attribué ?
Pourquoi le VAR 2 n'est pas attribué ?
Tous les Vaccins de l'enfant sont Fait. ( Féliciter la Maman )
Selectionner le centre de santé de référence
Saisir le nom de la formation sanitaire de référence
La visite de suivi vaccinal est dans **7 jours**

bind.calculate: if( /vaccination_referal_followup/vaccination_followup/fields/vaccine_BCG ='yes' and /vaccination_referal_followup/vaccination_followup/fields/vaccine_VPO_0 ='yes' and /vaccination_referal_followup/vaccination_followup/fields/vaccine_PENTA_1 ='yes' and /vaccination_referal_followup/vaccination_followup/fields/vaccine_VPO_1 ='yes' and /vaccination_referal_followup/vaccination_followup/fields/vaccine_PENTA_2 ='yes' and /vaccination_referal_followup/vaccination_followup/fields/vaccine_VPO_2 ='yes' and /vaccination_referal_followup/vaccination_followup/fields/vaccine_PENTA_3 ='yes' and /vaccination_referal_followup/vaccination_followup/fields/vaccine_VPO_3 ='yes' and /vaccination_referal_followup/vaccination_followup/fields/vaccine_VPI_1 ='yes' and /vaccination_referal_followup/vaccination_followup/fields/vaccine_VAR_1 ='yes' and /vaccination_referal_followup/vaccination_followup/fields/vaccine_VAA ='yes' and /vaccination_referal_followup/vaccination_followup/fields/vaccine_VPI_2 ='yes' and /vaccination_referal_followup/vaccination_followup/fields/vaccine_MEN_A ='yes' and /vaccination_referal_followup/vaccination_followup/fields/vaccine_VAR_2 ='yes', 'true', 'false')

if( /vaccination_referal_followup/vaccination_followup/fields/is_birth_vaccine_ok = 'true' and /vaccination_referal_followup/vaccination_followup/fields/is_six_weeks_vaccine_ok = 'true' and /vaccination_referal_followup/vaccination_followup/fields/is_ten_weeks_vaccine_ok = 'true' and /vaccination_referal_followup/vaccination_followup/fields/is_forteen_weeks_vaccine_ok = 'true' and /vaccination_referal_followup/vaccination_followup/fields/is_nine_months_vaccine_ok = 'true' and /vaccination_referal_followup/vaccination_followup/fields/is_fifty_months_vaccine_ok = 'true','false','true')
concat(concat(../patient_age_in_years, if(../patient_age_in_years = 1,' an et ',' ans et ')),concat(../patient_age_in_months mod 12, if((../patient_age_in_months mod 12) =1,' mois',' mois')))

concat(concat(../patient_age_in_years, if(../patient_age_in_years = 1,' year and ',' years and ')),concat(../patient_age_in_months mod 12, if((../patient_age_in_months mod 12) =1,' month old',' months old')))
if(../patient_sex = 'male' or ../patient_sex = 'homme' or ../patient_sex = 'Homme', 'Male', if(../patient_sex = 'female' or ../patient_sex = 'femme' or ../patient_sex = 'Femme', 'Female', ''))
if(../patient_sex = 'male' or ../patient_sex = 'homme' or ../patient_sex = 'Homme', 'Masculin', if(../patient_sex = 'female' or ../patient_sex = 'femme' or ../patient_sex = 'Femme', 'Féminin', ''))
